snippet.title: Police in standoff with mother in Darwin
snippet.content: HEAVILY armed police are attempting to end a standoff with a mother who is refusing to leave a Wanguri home with her children. Police blocked off Magaritis St late this morning as they attempted to negotiate with the mother. Five Territory Response Group members dressed in army fatigues with firearms and two plain clothed officers are at the property. It is understood there are children inside the home. An NT Police spokesman said the woman was suffering from mental health issues.
